headline: LEYBOLD INFICON DEPOSITION CONTROLLER

Manufacturer Inficon
Model IC/4 PLUS
Description Deposition Controller
Accessories Controller Only

One sensor board, unit has capabilities for a second sensor board(not included)

Other Information Remote Communications: RS232
To perform measurements at least one oscillator, sensor module, feedthrough and cables are required.
